welcome.subtitle: Other travel sites keep your money when prices drop. We think that's wrong.
welcome.moneyBack: Let's get your money back (no matter where you booked).

connectGmail.title: Connect your Gmail
connectGmail.description: We'll instantly find your past and upcoming bookings.

verifyPhone.title: Verify your phone number
verifyPhone.description: So we can text you when we find savings.

becomeMember.title: Become a member to start saving
becomeMember.description: Automatic refunds when prices drop for just $25/year.
